string-array.name: questionsArray
string-array.item: 1. Poster content is of professional quality and indicates a mastery of the project subject matter.
2. The presentation is organized, engaging, and includes a thorough description of the design and the implementation of the design.
3. All the team members are suitably attired, are polite, demonstrate full knowledge of material, and can answer all relevant questions.
4. The work product (model,rototype, documentation, set or computer simulation) is of professional quality in all respects.
5. The team implemented novel approaches and/or solutions in the development of the project.
6. The project has the potential to enhance the reputation of the Inovative Computing Project and/or CCI/DSI.
7. The team successfully explained the scope and results of their project in no more than 5 minutes.
